availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Josiah Alfred Evans (caldwell co, ky, miller)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and miller. Kentucky native. Son of Susan Evans. Married to Sarah Evans. Father of Lillian Evans, Alfred Evans, and Delia Evans. Farmer in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Miller in Caldwell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 2, 335B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 74.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Caldwell County, KY, June 1863, p. 11.
